_meanings:
Promoting long life, vital, 
preservative of life; {#idaM#} 
{#yaSasyamAyuzyamidaM niHSreyasaM paraM#} <ls>Ms. 1. 106</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">3. 106</ls>,
<ls n="Ms.">4. 13</ls>; <ls>M. 4. 4</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab>; <ls>Dk. 158.</ls>

{@--1@} Vital power, abundance of
life or vigour.

{@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a ceremony
performed after the birth of a
child.
